functions.name: Command (component)
functions.description: Styled wrapper around the cmdk Command primitive to provide a consistent design-system styling for command palettes.

functions.name: CommandDialog
functions.description: Dialog wrapper that places a Command component inside a DialogContent for an accessible command palette experience.

functions.name: CommandInput
functions.description: Input row for the command palette with an embedded Search icon and consistent styling.

functions.name: CommandList
functions.description: Scrollable list container for command items with a max height.

functions.name: CommandEmpty
functions.description: Placeholder shown when no command results match.

functions.name: CommandGroup
functions.description: Group wrapper for organizing command items with styled headings.

functions.name: CommandSeparator
functions.description: Visual separator used inside the command palette.

functions.name: CommandItem
functions.description: Individual selectable item in the command palette with selected/disabled state styling.

functions.name: CommandShortcut
functions.description: Small helper component to render keyboard shortcut text aligned to the right of a command item.

notes: These primitives centralize command-palette UI behavior and styling for consistent usage across the app.
